original: @9b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @9b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i badzra b'a r'a h'i kalpa:sarbb'artha s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i badzra b'a r'a h'i kalpa:sarbb'artha s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: śrī-vajravārāhīkalpa-sarvārthasādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The glorious Vajravārāhī's sādhana ritual called Accomplishing All Aims

original: dpal rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajravārāhī.

original: aom hr'im gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarbba dusht'a na h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'im gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarbba dusht'a na h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ghaṭa ghaṭa sarva duṣṭān hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: gtor ma byin nas bsam gtan bya'o //
analyzed: gtor ma byin nas bsam gtan bya'o //
translated: Having given the bali offering, one should practice concentration.

original: lte pa'i dbus su ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa /
analyzed: lte pa'i dbus su ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa /
translated: In the center of the navel, from raṃ arises a red, triangular fire maṇḍala.

original: de'i dbus su padma kha dog dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa /
analyzed: de'i dbus su padma kha dog dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa /
translated: In its center is a red four-petaled lotus.

original: de'i steng du hr'i: yi ge kalpa'i me 'bar ba can de yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: de'i steng du hr'i: yi ge kalpa'i me 'bar ba can de yongs su gyur pa las /
translated: Upon that, the syllable hrīḥ is ablaze with the fire of the kalpa.

original: bdag rdo rje phag mor bsam pa ni sku mdog dmar mo ro'i gdan la zhabs g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: bdag rdo rje phag mor bsam pa ni sku mdog dmar mo ro'i gdan la zhabs g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
translated: From that, one arises as Vajravārāhī, red, standing with the right leg straight on a corpse seat,

original: gcer bu skra gyen du brdzes pa thod pa'i cod pan can phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa phyag bzhi pa g-yas na rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'chang ba /
analyzed: gcer bu skra gyen du brdzes pa thod pa'i cod pan can phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa phyag bzhi pa g-yas na rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'chang ba /
translated: He is naked, with hair bristling upward, with a skull diadem, adorned with the five symbolic ornaments, and four-armed. He holds a vajra and a goad in his right hands,

original: g-yon pa kha tv'am ga thod pa dang sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa kha tv'am ga thod pa dang sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang ba'o //
translated: and a khaṭvāṅga and a threatening forefinger with a noose in his left hands.

original: @10a * // zhal gcig spyan gsum pa zhal khro gnyer can rdo rje dbyings shin tu 'jigs par mdzad pa /
analyzed: @10a * // zhal gcig spyan gsum pa zhal khro gnyer can rdo rje dbyings shin tu 'jigs par mdzad pa /
translated: He has one face, three eyes, a wrathful frown, and is terrifying like Vajradhātu.

original: gsus pa rgyas pa ljags 'gyu ba'o //
analyzed: gsus pa rgyas pa ljags 'gyu ba'o //
translated: His belly is distended, and his tongue flickers.

original: de ltar bsams nas ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bsams nas ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya'o //
translated: Having contemplated in this way, one should summon and absorb the awareness beings.

original: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myangs nas mnyam par gzhag pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myangs nas mnyam par gzhag pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Then, having made offerings and praises and tasted the elixir, one should recite the mantra while remaining in equipoise.

original: aom badzra b'a r'a h'i a'a be sha ya sarbba dusht'a ni hr'im sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra b'a r'a h'i a'a be sha ya sarbba dusht'a ni hr'im sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra-vārāhī āveśaya sarva-duṣṭān hriṃ svāhā.

original: nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po'o //
translated: This is the quintessence.

original: aom h'um hr'im ham snying po'o //
analyzed: aom h'um hr'im ham snying po'o //
translated: Oṃ hūṃ hriṃ haṃ. This is the essence.

original: 'bum yang dag par bzlas par yur na grub pa la the tshom med do //
analyzed: 'bum yang dag par bzlas par yur na grub pa la the tshom med do //
translated: If one recites one hundred thousand times, there is no doubt about accomplishment.

original: aom a'a:hr'im h'um h'am ha:sngags 'dis sha chen po'i phyi ma byas te thang sku'i drung du bdug pa dbul lo //
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'im h'um h'am ha:sngags 'dis sha chen po'i phyi ma byas te thang sku'i drung du bdug pa dbul lo //
translated: With the mantra Om āḥ hrīṃ hūṃ haṃ haḥ, one should make an outer offering of great flesh and offer incense in front of the painting.

original: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub ste 'di gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub ste 'di gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: One will be successful in twenty-one days. This is not otherwise.

original: aom hr'im ham h'am ha:h'a:hi:h'i:hri:hr'i:phem phem phat mtshan mo gtor ma phu lan bdud thams cad zhi bar 'gyur pas mtshan mo gtor ba'i nye spyod dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom hr'im ham h'am ha:h'a:hi:h'i:hri:hr'i:phem phem phat mtshan mo gtor ma phu lan bdud thams cad zhi bar 'gyur pas mtshan mo gtor ba'i nye spyod dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Om hrīṃ haṃ haḥ, haḥ hi hi hrīṃ hrīṃ pheṃ pheṃ phaṭ - at night one should offer a bali. All evil spirits will be pacified. One should offer a bali at night.

original: gong du ji skad bshad pa gsang par sgrub na rdo rje phag mos byin gyis rlob pa de la the tshem med do //
analyzed: gong du ji skad bshad pa gsang par sgrub na rdo rje phag mos byin gyis rlob pa de la the tshem med do //
translated: If one practices as explained above in secret, there is no doubt that Vajravārāhī will bless one.

original: dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po gnyis med rdo rje zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po gnyis med rdo rje zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The ritual procedure of the sādhana of glorious Vajravārāhī, called All Purposes Accomplished, composed by the great master Advaya-vajra-pāda, is complete.

original: // / lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos rtsang nyad ro cung ba'i gtsug lag khang chen po 'o ma phug gnas rnying du legs par bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos rtsang nyad ro cung ba'i gtsug lag khang chen po 'o ma phug gnas rnying du legs par bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated by the Tibetan monk Nyima Gyaltsen Pal Zangpo, the translator of Lo, at the great temple of Tsang Nyaro Chungwa, in the old residence of Omapa.
